Introduction

Im Chang-kyun (임창균), better known as I.M, is the lead rapper, vocalist and maknae of the boy group MONSTA X. He debuted through the Mnet's survival show No. Mercy, under Starship Entertainment.

He was supposed to debut in another group in 2014 (Nu’Bility), but plans fell through in the last minute, since he decided to leave the group.

I.M debuted as a member of MONSTA X on May 14, 2015 with their first mini-album "Trespass".

He made his solo debut on February 19, 2021, with his first digital mini album Duality.

In August 2022, he chose not to extend his contract with Starship Entertainment but will still continue to participate in the group's future plans. Later, in November, he signed an exclusive contract with Sony Music Korea for his solo activities.

Fun facts

1
He can speak English fluently. He’s the member with the best English in MONSTA X.
…
2
I.M joined with other trainees in No.Mercy – Mission 4. (When he was announced as a new trainee the other members weren’t too happy about this decision.)
…
3
I.M said that he was more nervous when he performed "Mirotic"by TVXQ than he was in the finale of No.Mercy.
…
4
Purple is his preferred colour.
…
5
He confessed that at first, he had a hard time being an object of public attention. He even said that he felt strange seeing his face everywhere as he did not like his own face.
…
6
His motto is “A good thing is a good thing, so when we look classy and sharp we get confidence from that”
…
7
He was the 6th trainee announced as a member of MONSTA X (after survival TV show “No Mercy”).
…
8
He shares a moisturizer with Kihyun and keeps it in a fridge.
…
9
He prefers outside more than being inside.
…
10
I.M lived for 3 years in Boston and in Israel for 4 years.
…
